arts.ttl: Enzo Maresca picks out three Chelsea youngsters for praise after 3-1 win over Astana as the Blues boss hails his young side for their performance
arts.sum: Marc Guiu and Renato Viega were on the scoresheet for the visitors, with an Aleksandr Marochkin own goal putting the icing on the cake to continue the Blues' perfect record.

arts.ttl: From London to Almaty: A Chelsea fan's 7,000-mile journey to watch their UEFA Conference League clash - which involved lamb heads, Lenin and 75p pints
arts.sum: KIERAN GILL: Chelsea were joined by around 500 fans on their trip to Kazakhstan for Thursday's Conference League clash with Astana and it is fair to say the journey was not for the faint-hearted.

arts.ttl: Joe Claims compares Chelsea youngster with Barcelona legend Luis Suarez after 3-1 win over FC Astana - as ex-Blues winger claims the club have 'a real gem'
arts.sum: In ice-cold climes, the Chelsea manager Enzo Maresca shuffled the pack and saw rotation quickly pay dividends when Marc Guiu found the back of the net within 14 minutes.

arts.ttl: Astana 1-3 Chelsea: Player ratings as Blues ease to significant European victory
arts.sum: Player ratings from Astana vs Chelsea in the Europa Conference League.

arts.ttl: Youthful Chelsea beat Astana to close in on Conference League last 16

arts.ttl: FC Astana 1-3 Chelsea: Blues' perfect UEFA Conference League record rolls on as Enzo Maresca's side qualify for the round of 16 with sub-zero victory
arts.sum: In ice-cold climes, the Chelsea manager shuffled the pack and saw rotation quickly pay dividends when Guiu found the back of the net within 14 minutes.

arts.ttl: Astana 1-3 Chelsea: Highlights, man of the match, stats as Maresca's men make it five wins from five 5,700km away from home
arts.sum: Chelsea maintain their 100% start in the Conference League with a routine 3-1 win away to Astana in below-freezing temperatures in Kazakhstan.

arts.ttl: FC Astana vs Chelsea – Match preview and team news
arts.sum: Chelsea travel to Kazakhstan to face FC Astana in the Europa Conference League this afternoon in what is the Blues’ furthest-ever European away trip. The West Londoners currently top the league phase after collecting maximum points from their opening four games.
